name: Homewood Suites West Palm Beach

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: After leaving Tampa My wife and I decided to travel to West Palm Beach so we made reservations at the Homewood Suites Hilton in WPB.
reviews.title: Top Notch at Homewood Suites

reviews.text: Purpose
reviews.title: Excellent staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We mainly came to West Palm Beach because the weather in Tampa was on the decline and WPB proved to have better conditions for our 1 week vacation. Then again we had 10” of snow deposited in our home town recently so anywhere above 60 would have been nice.
reviews.title: Good stay at Homewood Suites before flying home
Tge challenge. Results are in and....
reviews.text: Hotel Staff
Excellent – Friendly and professional – Very helpful and courteous
reviews.title: Outstanding

reviews.text: Spent a couple nights at this hotel while on business. The best thing I can say is that the staff at this Homewood Suites was really excellent – very attentive and also very friendly. The decor was consistent with the updated look Homewood is going for these days, but there were some issues with cleanliness in the room that were disappointing. There were obvious stains on the grout, some hairs on the wall, and in general it did not feel like the cleanest Homewood I have ever stayed at. The breakfast was average, definitely something I could work with but not quite as nice as I have found at other Homewoods.
reviews.title: Stellar staff and a good price

reviews.text: The hotel offers very easy access to I-95, and the price was definitely right. I would certainly stay here again, and would give it a solid 3.5 stars if I could.
reviews.title: Clean room, so-so service

reviews.text: When I arrived to check in around 4PM, there was nobody in sight at the front counter (nor was there any sort of bell to ring to get someone's attention). After standing there at least 5 minutes, someone taking out the trash noticed me and found the appropriate person to help me check-in. Check-in was quick and the person was very friendly. When I got to my room, my keys didn't work. The front desk re-activated them; this time it worked on the third or fourth try. The next morning, one of the cleaners noticed me struggling to get back into my room after returning from breakfast and offered to help using her key. She said something along the lines of "this room always has this problem". If so, it should probably be fixed! The room itself was very clean, everything worked the way it should and the staff was very friendly, so overall it was acceptable. Unfortunately, the check-in/key problems caused me to nearly be late to my event.
reviews.title: Nice decent Homewood Suites, uncomfy sofa bed

reviews.text: This was my first stay at a Homewood Suites and it was fairly decent. What I liked about the place was ceiling fans in the rooms. We stayed over the weekend, so I can't comment on the free dinners they serve Mon-Thu. The free breakfast was fine, very similar to what you'd get at an Hampton Inn. I will say that one of their elevators was not working, and it was a nuisance to walk a lot, and they didn't seem to be in a hurry to fix it. Other than that it was clean. The biggest disappointment was their very uncomfortable sofa bed (the extra bed is the whole point of getting a suite when traveling with family, and if mgmt is reading this I would highly recommend some investment there.
reviews.title: Great bed, great shower, clean

reviews.text: The area where the hotel is located looked decent, but for some reason it did not feel like a good part of town. Went to the IHOP down the street and it looked like some late night transaction was going on in the parking lot. Not too many decent options for a meal nearby (cracker barrel, IHOP and fast food).
reviews.title: great deal!

reviews.text: I have read the reviews from others saying they expect bottles of water ad the carpet to be newer. This hotel was great even without those things. The Breakfasts and dinners were good ( eggs and meat each day and a lot of other options) Good kitchenette in the room and exactly what was advertised. The bed slept great. There was a small convenience store in the lobby with sodas, beer and ice cream and necessities. The shuttle to the area businesses was there on time each morning and the the general manager was the driver and asked how he ( and his staff) was doing each day. The only thing about this hotel is that if you have a problem with folks in wheelchairs you should go elsewhere. These folks provide accommodations for quite a few of the local medical clinics.
reviews.title: Great Place to stay for many nights.

reviews.text: Gold Hilton customer here, disappointed. I would have rated this property 4+, but there were so many "little" things wrong with my stay that they added up to make it "average."
reviews.title: It's all about the details - needs improvement

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The following list needs attention by management:
reviews.title: nothing special

reviews.text: - Toilet paper is so thin you can see through it
reviews.title: Above Average Stay

reviews.text: - Rooms missing silverware, plates, glasses - could not set a table for 3
reviews.title: Great spot to stay in West Palm Beach

reviews.text: Stayed at this hotel 2 or 3 years ago when it seemed very new. Return visitfound the hotel still bright and clean. On arrival the receptionist told us that the room she had immediately had been used by a smoker but they were trying to refresh and we should check it out before accepting. Although there was a residual smell we decided to accept since it gave us an early check in although the exceptionally friendly receptionist did then concede that there was no other 2 bedroom suite available for that night.
reviews.title: Still pretty reasonable

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is the standard Homewood product with good beds but the service really sets it apart, both the reception staff and the breakfast staff. Would definitely prefer this hotel if I am in the area again.
reviews.title: Awesome Suites in WPB

reviews.text: Our first stay at Homewood Suites branch of Hilton family. VERY pleased with accommodations, breakfast and evening managers' reception. THANK YOU for a pleasant experience. Will definitely look for Homewood Suites in my monthly business travel in 2013. Thoroughly relaxing experience at this establishment. Very accommodating to travelers, families, etc.
reviews.title: After Christmas getaway with Family

reviews.text: We chose Home wood Suites for our trip to West Palm Beach many reasons such as value, cleanliness and accessibility to the various West Palm Beach attractions. I feel compelled to commend some staff members from this property for their above average performance,Starting with Jennifer at the front desk, and Claudine and Debbie from the breakfast buffet team. Our family spent four nights at this property and watched this staff interact with many patrons on a daily basis they were always smiling and noticeably put forth a compassionate effort to please all.
reviews.title: Confusing place - is this a hostel?

reviews.text: We stayed here for one night at the end of December. I'd found it through tripadvisor and booked it because of the excellent reviews. However, none of the reviews I read reflected what this place is really like. It seems to be some sort of hostel for people to stay in on an extended stay basis. There is free breakfast, and dinner from 5-7pm (free dinner!). We didn't try it because the reception area was just too depressing. The suite itself was fine and spacious. There's a separate living room with a small kitchen area. And the free wi-fi is great.The bathroom was a little dirty, but not too bad. The area of West Palm Beach itself if very downmarket, and wierdly so when you compare it to Palm Beach itself. This is definitely not the place for a holiday. But if you just want somewhere cheap to stay, with lots of space then this definitely ticks those boxes.
reviews.title: Clean and Comfortable

aka: Homewood Suites West Palm Beach Hotel
description: Homewood Suites West Palm Beach is an all-suite property offering suite accommodations for business, pleasure and extended stay travelers. We’re located within two premier corporate parks providing easy access to I-95 and just moments away from winning beaches. Our suites will make you feel right at home with hotel amenities including fully-equipped kitchen, two 42 Inch televisions, and complimentary high-speed Internet. Additional amenities include swimming pool, fitness center, business center, meeting room, billiards room.
